SEARCH
Package stockHw4

Class StockModelImpl

java.lang.Object
stockHw4.StockModelImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StockModel
public class StockModelImpl extends Object implements StockModel
The StockModelImpl class represents user portfolio's and features supported for it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StockModelImpl()
    Constructs an empty StockModelImpl constructor which initializes alphaVantageApi, tickerList, stockHashMapList, and load the ticker list from the csv file.
